website_summaries.verdict: The Reebok Royal Nylon Gum is a classic with an added oomph to its look. With its tested comfort and classic style, this is a great shoe for people who value ease and good looks. The shoe could also add a stylish accent to any outfit with its updated gum sole. Presented with the shoe’s aforementioned good qualities plus its affordable price, Royal Nylon Gum is easily a must-cop for many.
pros: A lot of reviewers loved the gum sole detail
The Reebok Royal Nylon Gum is a true classic with a twist
Majority of the wearers expressed how comfortable the shoe is
A couple of the shoe’s fans mentioned that they purchased a few more pairs because they loved it so much
The shoe’s tonal colors and classic silhouette go well with different looks, which some recognized as a must for a good sneaker for everyday wear
The Reebok Royal Nylon Gum is an affordable shoe compared to its contemporaries
Some wearers specifically appreciate the foam midsole as it is very comfortable and could be worn all day, according to them
A significant number of purchasers expressed their delight with the shoe having great quality and good value for the price
cons: There were reviewers who mentioned that the Reebok Royal Nylon Gum is smaller than their usual size
Recommended getting half a size bigger
Two buyers observed that the nylon material in the upper of the white colorway could get dirty easily

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with a classic
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my father. It fit's him perfectly. The leather makes it durable for everyday wear and the nylon allows it to be somewhat breathable. The styling is very much a classic and can be worn on a verity of occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: I love the look of these sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these sneakers, but now that I got them they aren't as comfortable as my Nikes that I've gotten used to. Nonetheless this sneaker is still a good rotation into the mix of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Mummau

customer_reviews.title: Gotta get me a second pair
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable and well built & a nice looking sneakers...the fit is just right...i plan 2 buy another pair!!!
customer_reviews.author: Damon

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe! Very cushy insole
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe! Very cushy insole. I have very prominent arches and these shoes are great for long wear. The one problem is the nylon gets dirty super easily. The white of the leather contrasts so much with the now grayish/brown color of the shiny nylon part which looks pretty gross honestly. If you are going to get these shoes be prepared to work to keep them clean and nice looking. The gum sole is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Sonee Ya

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable sneakers. Fit as expected. Will definitely buy another pair in different color.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Lopez

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable! I tend to wear Nike's air max 90s ...
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable! I tend to wear Nike's air max 90s and I find these just as comfortable and fashionable. Definetly buying more Reebok Classics in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa P.

customer_reviews.title: Just what he wanted
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for the hubby.... Arrived early and just in time for Fathers Day. He loved them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the style
customer_reviews.text: Love the style. Only issue inside seams are hard rubs agents foot can be uncomfortable. Not much cushion. If your looking for comfort this sneaker isn't for you. If your looking for styling with outfits can't beat the price. Overall it's an ok sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gon

customer_reviews.title: They just like picture and fits like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Live them! They just like picture and fits like a champ
customer_reviews.author: Cea

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: Im a fan of classic sneakers... I love these! Comfortable and classy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are my all time favorite style of shoe. I've been buying them in different colors for as long as I can remember. These are just as good as the others have been. Construction was great, and although the memory foam makes them feel very tight the first time you put them on, it eventually wears in a bit and actually feels very comfortable. I will continue purchasing these.
customer_reviews.author: D. Preez

customer_reviews.title: The memory foam in them makes them perfect all day
customer_reviews.text: It met all my expectations. The memory foam in them makes them perfect all day shoes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit small but I'm ok with it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great kicks
customer_reviews.text: got ma shoes on time loving the tumbled leather and the nylon fit as expected lovely shoe the gum bottom will get all eyes on you jus the uniqueness of this reebok is super cool #love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this Reebok Classic
customer_reviews.text: I love this Reebok Classic! The yellowish brown bottom rubber material gives pretty sick design. After washing couple of times, the shoe does wear off which is expected. However, the price is pretty competitive on Amazon so I've gone through about 3 pairs already (different colors) in about 3 years. If you never had Reebok Classics, the comfortable level is comparable to Nike Air Max. But I've notice the sole inside does wear off as the time goes by.
customer_reviews.author: Sung Woon Choe

customer_reviews.title: Would have given this five stars had they offered the ...
customer_reviews.text: Would have given this five stars had they offered the sky blue gum bottoms, but other than that the shoe fit as expected. Will buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Mistah.316

product_meta.title: Reebok mens Royal Nylon Gum-m
product_meta.description: Comfort is king with the Reebok Royal Nylon Gum.
feature_bullets: Low-cut sneaker in leather featuring classic retro silhouette and logos at tongue, back collar, and side underlay
Carbon rubber heel strike for durable traction
